name: Futebol de Botao
description:
Use your finger as a pick, build your attack and defense strategy, be precise in moving your buttons to perform touches, dribbles and kicks against your opponent.

Futebol de Button is a touchscreen game, with single and multiplayer modes. And more: Futebol de Button is multiplatform! Challenge players from multiple devices in a single game!

*Now With Relegation in the Brasileirão Serie A and B

Button football, also called table football, is a simulated football game broadcast on a table, using buttons that represent the players and are moved with the aid of a pick.

In 2 Player Button Soccer you can challenge your friends to see who is the best. Play tournaments to increase your coins and buy new times and items.

Choose your time, select formation and score more goals than your opponent to be the winner!

IF YOU LIKE IT, SHARE IT WITH YOUR FRIENDS THIS WAY THERE WILL ALWAYS BE PEOPLE PLAYING THE ONLINE MODE!
